thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com
thread.title: Carol Goss

author: Carol Goss
title: Carol Goss
text: I was very pleased with my experience with Trusted Housesitters....this was the first time I used the service, and it was excellent. I thought the yearly rate was very reasonable, and their website was user friendly. I had several good applicants, and was pleased with Allen, who looked after our cat and home for the past month. Would definitely use the service again, and have told several people about it.
